Name: Scene fragment
Description: A limestone fragment of a tomb wall. It shows what appears to be part of a banqueting scene, two women and a man are seated on black stools and facing right. There is the figure of another man partially visible at the far left. The women wear long, fine linen tunics and long wigs with decorative bands. The man has on a long linen kilt, a blue collar and shoulder length wig, he holds a blue lotus flower to his nose. The background to the scene is yellow.
